pages.text: $(li)The Desert is a dry biome mainly composed by Sand.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Even being a desert place without much life, you can find some vegetation, like Cactus, Poppies, Dandelions, Grass, Dead Bushes and, sometimes, Yucca trees.

$(li)Some animals can withstand these harsh conditions, like Roadrunners, Rattlesnake, Tarantula Hawks.$(br)$(li)On the nights Hushes will be around the Deserts too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Desert$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
